Limits and conditions¶

POST¶

  • /api/data_key/ 3 per 60 minutes

  • /api/register/ 5 per 1 minute, 10 per 30 minutes

Note

  • the amount of characters of the username must be 2 < x <= 32

  • the username can’t contain spaces and dots

  • the password must contain at least:

    • 10 characters

    • upper-case and lower-case letters

    • one digit

    • one special character !"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@[\]^_`{|}~

  • the amount of characters of the password must be <= 128

  • the password can’t contain non-ascii characters

  • /api/login/ 5 per minute, 10 per 30 minutes

Note

the password must be encrypted.

  • /api/logout/ 5 per minute

  • /api/refresh_token/ 5 per minute

  • /api/start_conversation/ 10 per 15 minutes

  • /api/send_message/ 5 per 1 second

  • /api/update_settings/ 10 per 1 minute

  • /api/ack/ 5 per second

GET¶

  • /api/get_messages/ 10 per 1 minute

Websockets¶

  • /api/notifications/ 5 listeners per user

Something
